title: Cache Computer Consulting
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: cache_computer_consulting
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $29.8M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Cache Computer Consulting. The average
  contract duration was 1.85 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $680.8K. The longest
  contract was 7.54 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $9.4M.
lookup_name: 'CACHE COMPUTER CONSULTING'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '29.8M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '233'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '117'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '50%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '206%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.9'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '60.8M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.85'
s421_mean_contract_value: '680.8K'
s425_max_duration: '7.54'
s422_max_contract_value: '9.4M'
---
